SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.label: No Temperature Penalties
SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.description: Removes temperature-related sleep penalties for pawns sleeping in this floor. - This is for testing only and has no effect as of now.

SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.label: Only For Basements
SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.description: This upgrade only shows up for basements.

SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.label: Extra Room
SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.description: Adds another room with a double bed (2 bedspaces). This creates multiple private rooms, eliminating the shared bed debuff.

SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.label: Barracks
SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.description: Doubles the amount of beds in the staircase, turning it into a barracks.

SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.label: Basic Decoration
SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.description: Adds simple decorations to improve the room's impressiveness slightly.

SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.label: Comfortable Upgrade
SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.description: Upgrades furniture and amenities to make the room more comfortable.

SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.label: Fine Decoration
SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.description: Adds fine art and decorations to make the room impressive.

SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.label: Luxury Finishing
SecondFloor.StaircaseUpgradeDef.description: High-end materials and luxury amenities make this room extremely impressive.
